price: DO Senhor dos céus e da terra e do que há entre ambos, dO Misericordioso. Não terão o poder de falar-Lhe.
arabic: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِۖ لَا يَمۡلِكُونَ مِنۡهُ خِطَابٗا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā al-raḥmāni lā yamlikūna min'hu khiṭāban
